title: Thank you Riot!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I had a very toxic and troll player in a recent game, so I reported it thinking "well... it's not like anything will happen".

Low and behold, I logged in last night to find this message.

Thanks for punishing this player.

<3
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: These make me all warm and fuzzy inside
I love seeing that message from RIot pop up. It gives be the little bit of hope that one day OCE and league can be a friendly toxic free space :)
I got the same feedback this Monday, makes me have faith in the report system
this makes me feel like all my rreports are for nothing
If only this happened when you report intent feeders and griefers. But unfortunately it doesn't.
